name: Vacant
description: Vacant is a point and click adventure game about Jade Bridgett-- a new intern at a mysterious government agency called "The Eye". On her first day, she gets put on a case to find three missing people, all at which are presumed dead. It's your job to find them and the culprit.
minimum_requirements: OS: OS: Windows XP SP2+ Processor: Intel i3-6300 or AMD FX 6300 Memory: 1250 MB RAM Graphics: DX9 (shader model 3.0) or DX11 with feature level 9.3 capabilities. DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1250 MB available space
